Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2018 10:34AM sfmred72 wrote: Hi, everyone. I start radiation on Monday (well, really on Tuesday--Monday is the simulation), and I appreciate the tips I've seen here, and well as the sharing of SE experiences. I'm a really fair-skinned person, so particularly worried about a burn, but actually my dr. says that it doesn't necessarily mean I'll have a bad burn. We'll see! By the way, he recommended a lotion called "My Girls" (which I thought was a pretty funny name), and said that most of his patients have found it to be the best they've tried. I got it on Amazon.
Posts.Title: August 2018 Starting Radiation astyanax66 Insideout2
